headline: Government announces revised tax policy after review
body: The Finance Ministry released new guidelines for the upcoming fiscal year. Officials stated that the changes aim to simplify compliance for small businesses while maintaining revenue targets.

headline: SHOCKING: Scientists EXPOSE secret government plan to DESTROY the economy overnight!
body: Unnamed sources claim that a secret committee has been meeting to plan the total collapse of the financial system. Experts say this could happen as early as next week!

headline: New study finds coffee may have health benefits
body: Researchers at a leading university published findings suggesting that moderate coffee consumption may be associated with reduced risk of certain conditions. The study was peer-reviewed and published in a medical journal.

headline: URGENT: Doctors WARN that this common food is KILLING you slowly!
body: You won't believe what's been hiding in your kitchen! This deadly ingredient is in almost everything you eat. Share this before it's too late!
